content: I get both pays and am trying to make sure I have the proper tax deductions made. The new tax reduced my military pay deductions and to me it seems too much I tried the IRS calculator and it does not work because it does not calculate military pay and SS properly. Any ideas appreciated. Thanks

title: 2009 Taxes on Retired Pay & SS

content: sit tight and wait...... in about 3 years you will know if you screwed up. Then it is a matter of figuring how to pay the accumulated interest they imposed. But by then it will be 2012 and you may not have to worry about it anyway. One Flag......One Heart......One Nation............EVERMORE
